name: Dracula (itch)
description:
This game was made for the second Full Moon Jam: the Book Adaptation game jam. The book I chose to adapt was Bram Stoker's Dracula as it depicts Dracula's night on the town. The aim of the game is to make the most points and get the best highscore. 

This game could not have been made without the support from the great folks on the Full Moon Jam Discord server.
